title: The definition namespace for the Database server used in a Nox solution.
description: Specify properties pertinent to the solution Database server here. Examples include name, serverUri, Port and connection credentials

provider.title: The database provider.
provider.description: The provider used for this database server. Examples include SqlServer, Postgres and others. Can also be a Nox variable i.e. ${{ env.DB_PROVIDER }}

name.title: The unique name of this server component in the solution.
name.description: The name of this server component in the solution. The name must be unique in the solution configuration

serverUri.title: Hostname, IP address or URI.
serverUri.description: The name, address, URI or IP of the server to connect to.

port.title: Server port
port.description: The port to connect to. Can be an integer or a Nox variable i.e. ${{ env.DB_PORT }}

user.title: Username.
user.description: The username to use when connecting to this server.

password.title: Password.
password.description: The password to use when connecting to this server.

options.title: Additional options.
options.description: A list of additional options to set when connecting to this server.
